title: Disconnected from a game and can't rejoin it
body:
So i was in a ranked game and i got disconnected for some strange reason, after about 5 minutes in game. 
My internet is fine, i never lost it, i can ping whatever i want, but i got quicked out of the game, and when i try to start the launcher again,
it allows me join a new game as if my first game never existed. It's the first time i experience this bug, and i didn't change anything in my settings or my computer configuration, including my firewall.  Am i the only one with this kind of troubles?

replies.body: Your internet might be good while it's connected, but it sounds like there is definitely some instability while specifically communicating with the game server.  I recommend starting out with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities while strengthening your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
